article.title: ITT to Provide SpearNet Radio System to Spanish Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ITT Communications Systems of ITT Corporation has been selected by the Defence & Security Division of the European Aeronautic Defence and Space Company (EADS) to provide its SpearNet radio system for the full-scale engineering development phase of Spain's Combatiente del Futuro, a military modernization program. The SpearNet radio will provide the backbone for voice, data and video communications for the Spanish Army.
